nodes.text: The scyk was a species of swift, vicious lizard native to the desert planet Tatooine. The M3-A Scyk interceptor manufactured by MandalMotors was named for the reptile.

In the new Star Wars canon, the scyk was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The species originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies.
